name: hilhhi

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)), wcel(c0, cnv))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wcel(c0, cnv)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
⊣ c0 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
-| wceq(cva, cfv(cpv, c0))
-| wceq(csm, cfv(cns, c0))

body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >)
⊣ +h =(+v ` c0)
⊣ .h =(.sOLD ` c0)
⊣ normh =(normCV ` c0)
